message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly biased offer.  I'm willing to give you a small slice of the pie, but I'm sure you'll see the value in getting something now rather than risking it all for a chance at more later.
Alice, let's be realistic. I understand you value getting something now, but my patience has limits.  This is a much fairer starting point.  Don't let greed cloud your judgement.
Okay, I see you're serious. This is a more balanced offer. I'm willing to compromise, but it's still important to me to get a good share.  Let's make this work.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Time is literally money in this game, and it's disappearing faster for you.  I'm offering a deal that would have been acceptable two rounds ago.  Don't be foolish.
